siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
MAGIC ITEMS ARE COMING TO CLASH ROYALE! Our new update is coming very soon making it easier than ever to upgrade your cards and build your perfect deck! Also included in this update are balance changes, bug fixes, updated UI, Clan Wars 2 changes, performance improvements & more!

00:00​ NEW UPDATE
00:30​ MAGIC ITEMS
00:42​ WILD CARDS
01:12​ BOOK OF CARDS
01:25​ BOOK OF BOOKS
01:37​ CHEST KEY
01:50​ MAGIC COIN
02:04​ WHERE TO GET MAGIC ITEMS
02:24​ PASS ROYALE IMPROVEMENTS
02:52​ OTHER CHANGES
03:01​ CLAN WARS 2 IMPROVEMENTS
03:21​ BALANCE CHANGES
03:43​ NEW SEASON

Information in this video is subject to change. All gameplay is taken from a work in progress developer build version, not the live game. Magic Items are only available for players King Level 4+.

Subscribe for more! ►► http://supr.cl/SubRoyale

Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.

Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.

Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!

FEATURES
• Duel players from around the world in real-time in both 1v1 and 2v2 Battles
• Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones
• Destroy opponent's towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests
• Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses
• Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents
• Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top
• Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community
• Challenge your Clanmates and friends to a private duel, or play side-by-side in a 2v2 Battle
• Work together with your Clan to unlock Clan Chests
• Play new events every week
• Learn different battle tactics by watching the best duels on TV Royale

PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale. A network connection is also required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-royale/ or contact us in-game by going to Settings, Help and support.

Privacy Policy:
http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/

Parent's Guide:
http://supercell.com/en/parents/

#ClashRoyale #Update #MagicItems
blogPost.body:
MAGIC ITEMS ARE COMING TO CLASH ROYALE! Our new update is coming very soon making it easier than ever to upgrade your cards and build your perfect deck! Also included in this update are balance changes, bug fixes, updated UI, Clan Wars 2 changes, performance improvements & more!

00:00​ NEW UPDATE
00:30​ MAGIC ITEMS
00:42​ WILD CARDS
01:12​ BOOK OF CARDS
01:25​ BOOK OF BOOKS
01:37​ CHEST KEY
01:50​ MAGIC COIN
02:04​ WHERE TO GET MAGIC ITEMS
02:24​ PASS ROYALE IMPROVEMENTS
02:52​ OTHER CHANGES
03:01​ CLAN WARS 2 IMPROVEMENTS
03:21​ BALANCE CHANGES
03:43​ NEW SEASON

Information in this video is subject to change. All gameplay is taken from a work in progress developer build version, not the live game. Magic Items are only available for players King Level 4+.

Subscribe for more! ►► http://supr.cl/SubRoyale

Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.

Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.

Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!

• Duel players from around the world in real-time in both 1v1 and 2v2 Battles
• Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones
• Destroy opponent's towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests
• Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses
• Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents

PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale. A network connection is also required.

blogPost.title: NEW UPDATE ✨ MAGIC ITEMS ✨ Coming soon... (Clash Royale TV Royale)
blogPost.author: Clash Royale

localize.title: 最新更新 ✨ 魔法物品 ✨ 即将推出... ... (Clash Royale TV Royale)
localize.description:
魔法物品即将进入《大逃杀》! 我们的新更新即将到来,让你比以往更容易升级你的卡牌,打造你的完美卡组! 本次更新还包括平衡性改动、BUG修复、更新UI、Clan Wars 2改动、性能提升等内容!

00:00 新更新
00:30 魔法物品
00:42 狂欢卡牌
01:12 卡片书
01:25 书籍
01:37 胸键
01:50 魔法币
02:04 魔法物品的获取途径
02:24 通行证改进措施
02:52 其他变化
03:01 家族战争2的改进
03:21 资产负债表变化
03:43 新赛季

本视频中的信息可能会发生变化。所有的游戏玩法都是取自正在进行中的开发者构建版本，而非实机游戏。魔法物品只适用于王者4级以上的玩家。

更多内容请订阅! ►► http://supr.cl/SubRoyale

进入竞技场! 由Clash of Clans的创造者推出的一款实时多人游戏，由Royales、你最喜欢的Clash角色和更多的东西组成。

收集并升级数十张卡牌,这些卡牌包含了你所熟悉和喜爱的Clash of Clans部队、法术和防具,以及Royales。王子、骑士、龙宝宝等。将敌方国王和公主从塔楼上击倒,击败你的对手,并在竞技场中赢得奖杯、皇冠和荣耀。组建一个家族来分享卡牌,建立你自己的战斗社区。

带领Clash Royale家族走向胜利!

游戏特色
- 来自世界各地的玩家在1v1和2v2的战斗中实时对决。
- 赚取箱子来解锁奖励，收集强大的新卡和升级现有的卡。
- 摧毁对手的塔，赢得皇冠，以获得史诗级的皇冠箱子
- 构建和升级你的卡牌收藏与Clash Royale家族以及数十种你最喜欢的Clash部队、法术和防御。
- 构建你的终极战斗卡组来击败你的对手。
- 在多个竞技场中不断进步，直至达到顶峰。
- 组建宗族，共享卡牌，建立自己的战斗社区。
- 挑战你的族友和朋友进行私人决斗，或在2v2战斗中并肩作战。
- 与你的宗族一起合作，解锁宗族宝箱。
- 每周都有新的活动
- 通过观看电视大逃杀中最精彩的决斗，学习不同的战斗战术。

请注意！《大逃杀》是免费下载和游戏的，但是，一些游戏项目也可以用真钱购买。如果您不想使用此功能，请在您的设备设置中禁用应用内购买。另外，根据我们的服务条款和隐私政策，你必须年满13岁才能玩或下载Clash Royale。此外，还需要网络连接。

支持。
你有问题吗？请访问 http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-royale/ 或在游戏中联系我们，进入设置、帮助和支持。

隐私政策。
http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/

服务条款。
http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/

家长指南。
http://supercell.com/en/parents/

#ClashRoyale#更新#MagicItems

localize.title: 最新更新 ✨ 魔法物品 ✨ 即將推出... ... (Clash Royale TV Royale)
localize.description:
魔法物品即將進入《大逃殺》! 我們的新更新即將到來,讓你比以往更容易升級你的卡牌,打造你的完美卡組! 本次更新還包括平衡性改動、BUG修復、更新UI、Clan Wars 2改動、性能提升等內容!

00:00 新更新
00:30 魔法物品
00:42 狂歡卡牌
01:12 卡片書
01:25 書籍
01:37 胸鍵
01:50 魔法幣
02:04 魔法物品的獲取途徑
02:24 通行證改進措施
02:52 其他變化
03:01 家族戰爭2的改進
03:21 資產負債表變化
03:43 新賽季

本視頻中的信息可能會發生變化。所有的遊戲玩法都是取自正在進行中的開發者構建版本，而非實機遊戲。魔法物品只適用於王者4級以上的玩家。

更多內容請訂閱! ►► http://supr.cl/SubRoyale

進入競技場! 由Clash of Clans的創造者推出的一款實時多人遊戲，由Royales、你最喜歡的Clash角色和更多的東西組成。

收集並升級數十張卡牌,這些卡牌包含了你所熟悉和喜愛的Clash of Clans部隊、法術和防具,以及Royales。王子、騎士、龍寶寶等。將敵方國王和公主從塔樓上擊倒,擊敗你的對手,並在競技場中贏得獎盃、皇冠和榮耀。組建一個家族來分享卡牌,建立你自己的戰鬥社區。

帶領Clash Royale家族走向勝利!

遊戲特色
- 來自世界各地的玩家在1v1和2v2的戰鬥中實時對決。
- 賺取箱子來解鎖獎勵，收集強大的新卡和升級現有的卡。
- 摧毀對手的塔，贏得皇冠，以獲得史詩級的皇冠箱子
- 構建和升級你的卡牌收藏與Clash Royale家族以及數十種你最喜歡的Clash部隊、法術和防禦。
- 構建你的終極戰鬥卡組來擊敗你的對手。
- 在多個競技場中不斷進步，直至達到頂峯。
- 組建宗族，共享卡牌，建立自己的戰鬥社區。
- 挑戰你的族友和朋友進行私人決鬥，或在2v2戰鬥中並肩作戰。
- 與你的宗族一起合作，解鎖宗族寶箱。
- 每週都有新的活動
- 通過觀看電視大逃殺中最精彩的決鬥，學習不同的戰鬥戰術。

請注意！《大逃殺》是免費下載和遊戲的，但是，一些遊戲項目也可以用真錢購買。如果您不想使用此功能，請在您的設備設置中禁用應用內購買。另外，根據我們的服務條款和隱私政策，你必須年滿13歲才能玩或下載Clash Royale。此外，還需要網絡連接。

支持。
你有問題嗎？請訪問 http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-royale/ 或在遊戲中聯繫我們，進入設置、幫助和支持。

隱私政策。
http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/

服務條款。
http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/

家長指南。
http://supercell.com/en/parents/

#ClashRoyale#更新#MagicItems
